item.title: UnifiedCrawl: Aggregated Common Crawl for Affordable Adaptation of LLMs on Low-Resource Languages
item.description: UnifiedCrawl efficiently harvests massive monolingual datasets for low-resource languages from Common Crawl, enabling affordable LLM adaptation via QLoRA, significantly improving performance.
